description: Kaomoji fish are pretty easy to make just by using brackets and > or < characters. Brackets can be used for the body and then < and > can be used for the tail and the mouth. You can also use 彡 for tails or fins. Fish can be made to be swimming left or right. Right to make two fish that are kissing! Use these puckered up lips ❥!
